metadata.title: The Sea View Penthouse - Luxury Vacation Rental in Ashdod
metadata.description: Experience luxury at its finest in our stunning sea view penthouse in Ashdod. Perfect for intimate events, family vacations, and unforgettable stays.

hero.title: Your Private Sea View Penthouse
hero.subtitle: Experience luxury living with breathtaking Mediterranean views in the heart of Ashdod. Where modern elegance meets coastal serenity.

about.title: Penthouse in Details
about.subtitle: Discover every exquisite detail of our luxury sea view penthouse, where modern sophistication meets coastal elegance in the heart of Ashdod.
about.locationDescription: Perched high above the Mediterranean coastline, our penthouse offers unobstructed sea views and easy access to Ashdod's finest beaches, restaurants, and cultural attractions. The strategic location provides both tranquility and convenience.
about.featuresSubtitle: Every space has been thoughtfully designed to provide the ultimate luxury experience

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about staying at our luxury sea view penthouse

howFarAdvance.question: How far in advance should I book?
howFarAdvance.answer: We recommend booking at least 2-4 weeks in advance, especially during peak season (May-September) and holidays. For events and special occasions, earlier booking is advised to ensure availability.

cancellationPolicy.question: What is your cancellation policy?
cancellationPolicy.answer: Free cancellation up to 14 days before check-in. Cancellations between 7-14 days incur a 50% charge. Less than 7 days notice results in full charge. We understand emergencies happen and will work with you when possible.

securityDeposit.question: Do you require a security deposit?
securityDeposit.answer: Yes, we require a refundable security deposit of $500 which is returned within 7 days after checkout, provided there are no damages or excessive cleaning required.

checkInOut.question: What are your check-in and check-out times?
checkInOut.answer: Check-in is from 3:00 PM and check-out is by 11:00 AM. Early check-in or late check-out may be available upon request and subject to availability.

whatIncluded.question: What amenities are included?
whatIncluded.answer: All stays include high-speed WiFi, fully equipped kitchen, premium bedding, luxury bathroom amenities, private parking, and access to the 270m² balcony. We also provide welcome refreshments and 24/7 concierge support.

parkingAvailable.question: Is there parking available?
parkingAvailable.answer: Yes, we provide secure private parking for up to 2 vehicles. Additional parking can be arranged nearby if needed for larger groups or events.

petsAllowed.question: Do you allow pets?
petsAllowed.answer: We welcome well-behaved pets with prior approval. A pet fee of $50 per stay applies, and we ask that pets are supervised at all times, especially on the balcony.

suitableChildren.question: Is the penthouse suitable for children?
suitableChildren.answer: Yes, families are welcome! The penthouse is child-friendly with safety features on the balcony. We can provide cribs, high chairs, and other baby equipment upon request.

howCloseBeach.question: How close are you to the beach?
howCloseBeach.answer: We're located just 200 meters from Ashdod's beautiful beaches. The penthouse offers direct sea views, and the beach is an easy 3-minute walk away.

nearbyDining.question: What's nearby for dining and entertainment?
nearbyDining.answer: Ashdod offers excellent restaurants, cafes, and cultural attractions within walking distance. The marina, shopping centers, and historic sites are all easily accessible. We provide a comprehensive local guide upon arrival.

airportTransport.question: How do I get to the penthouse from the airport?
airportTransport.answer: Ben Gurion Airport is approximately 45 minutes by car. We can arrange airport transfers, or you can take a taxi, rental car, or public transportation. Detailed directions are provided upon booking confirmation.

publicTransport.question: Is public transportation available?
publicTransport.answer: Yes, Ashdod has good public transportation including buses and trains. The central train station is 10 minutes away, providing easy access to Tel Aviv, Jerusalem, and other major cities.

canHostEvents.question: Can I host events at the penthouse?
canHostEvents.answer: Our penthouse is perfect for intimate events up to 30 guests. We can accommodate wedding proposals, anniversary celebrations, business meetings, and family gatherings. Event planning services are available.

cateringServices.question: Do you provide catering services?
cateringServices.answer: We can arrange catering through our network of premium local caterers and private chefs. Our fully equipped kitchen also allows for self-catering or hiring your own chef.

noiseRestrictions.question: Are there noise restrictions for events?
noiseRestrictions.answer: We ask that events respect quiet hours from 10 PM to 8 AM out of consideration for neighbors. Music and celebrations are welcome during appropriate hours.

eventPlanning.question: Can you help with event planning?
eventPlanning.answer: Yes! We offer event planning assistance including decoration setup, vendor recommendations, and coordination services. Contact us to discuss your specific needs and vision.

faq.stillHaveQuestionsSubtitle: Our team is here to help you plan the perfect stay
